languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, экстренное сообщение! Авгуры засекли несколько кораблей, медленно берущих нас в кольцо. Запрос остановить преследование полностью игнорируется, однако нам навстречу выслали беспилотное судно, транслирующее лишь два слова: "Подарок" и "Хейдари".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, экстренное сообщение! Авгуры засекли несколько кораблей, медленно берущих нас в кольцо. Запрос остановить преследование полностью игнорируется, однако нам навстречу выслали беспилотное судно, транслирующее лишь два слова: "Подарок" и "Хейдари".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, экстренное сообщение! Авгуры засекли несколько кораблей, медленно берущих нас в кольцо. Запрос остановить преследование полностью игнорируется, однако нам навстречу выслали беспилотное судно, транслирующее лишь два слова: "Подарок" и "Хейдари".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'"
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “舰长大人，收到紧急报告！俄歇矩阵探测到几艘虚空舰正在慢慢包围我们。我们要求对方停止追击，但对方完全无视了我们的要求。不过，有一艘无人操控的飞船朝我们的方向驶了过来，只传达了两个词——‘礼物’和‘海达利’。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，收到紧急报告！俄歇矩阵探测到几艘虚空舰正在慢慢包围我们。我们要求对方停止追击，但对方完全无视了我们的要求。不过，有一艘无人操控的飞船朝我们的方向驶了过来，只传达了两个词——‘礼物’和‘海达利’。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, es una emergencia! Los augures detectan varias naves del vacío que nos tienen rodeados. No han respondido a nuestras solicitudes de detener esta persecución, pero nos han enviado una nave no tripulada que transmite dos palabras: "regalo" y "Heydari"».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'"

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, es una emergencia! Los augures detectan varias naves del vacío que nos tienen rodeados. No han respondido a nuestras solicitudes de detener esta persecución, pero nos han enviado una nave no tripulada que transmite dos palabras: "regalo" y "Heydari"».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、緊急のご報告です！数隻のヴォイドシップが我々を徐々に取り囲んでいると、スキャナーが検出しました。この追跡を中止するよう要請しましたが、完全に無視され、こちらに向けて無人船が派遣されました。無人船の通信は、『ギフト』と『ヘイダリ』の2語のみです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、緊急のご報告です！数隻のヴォイドシップが我々を徐々に取り囲んでいると、スキャナーが検出しました。この追跡を中止するよう要請しましたが、完全に無視され、こちらに向けて無人船が派遣されました。無人船の通信は、『ギフト』と『ヘイダリ』の2語のみです」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, un rapport urgent ! Les augures ont détecté plusieurs vaisseaux qui tentent de nous encercler. Nous leur avons demandé de cesser leurs manœuvres, mais ils se sont contentés d'envoyer un appareil autonome qui diffuse simplement ces deux mots : "cadeau" et "Heydari". »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, un rapport urgent ! Les augures ont détecté plusieurs vaisseaux qui tentent de nous encercler. Nous leur avons demandé de cesser leurs manœuvres, mais ils se sont contentés d'envoyer un appareil autonome qui diffuse simplement ces deux mots : "cadeau" et "Heydari". »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Notfallbericht! Die Auguren haben mehrere Raumschiffe entdeckt, die uns langsam umkreisen. Unsere Anforderungen, diese Verfolgung einzustellen, wurden komplett ignoriert, aber ein unbemanntes Schiff wurde in unsere Richtung losgeschickt. Es sendet nur zwei Worte: 'Geschenk' und 'Heydari'."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Notfallbericht! Die Auguren haben mehrere Raumschiffe entdeckt, die uns langsam umkreisen. Unsere Anforderungen, diese Verfolgung einzustellen, wurden komplett ignoriert, aber ein unbemanntes Schiff wurde in unsere Richtung losgeschickt. Es sendet nur zwei Worte: 'Geschenk' und 'Heydari'.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, acil durum var! Alametler, etrafımızı yavaş yavaş saran birkaç uçsuz gemisi tespit etti. Takibi kesmelerini talep ettik ama dönüt alamadık. Ancak bize doğru insansız bir vasıta gönderdiler. Vasıta, yayın kanalında şu iki kelimeyi tekrarlayıp duruyor: 'Hediye' ve 'Heydari'."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, emergency report! The augurs have detected several voidships slowly encircling us. Our requests for this pursuit to cease have been completely ignored, but an unmanned vessel has been dispatched in our direction, broadcasting only two words: 'Gift' and 'Heydari.'"
